import Nav from "./Nav" import images from "../Assets/images.jpg" import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import PostLoginData from "../" const Login = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [logindata , setLogindata] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) const updateLoginData = (event,field) => { setLogindata({...logindata,[field]:event.target.value}) } const sendLoginData = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); PostLoginData(logindata) } return (

Sign in to your account

{updateLoginData(e,"email")}}/>
updateLoginData(e,"password")}/>
Forgot password?

Don’t have an account yet? Sign up

); } export default Login;
